p: SARS-CoV-2 arose from Wuhan, Hubei Province, China. It spread rapidly through all the worldâ€™s countries and to date has killed 635,173 persons with more than 15,581,009 cases of in the world, including Europe, in which currently there have been over 208,580 deaths. The number of infected cases is steadily increasing especially in the USA, South America (Brazil), South East Asia, and Africa [ 16].
